description: The HX_CHRONIC_MEDS table contains information about the chronic medications history in the problem list database.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the problem record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CHRON_MED_HX_ST_DT
columns.description: Specifies the chronic medications history start date

columns.name: CHRON_MED_HX_END_DT
columns.description: Specifies the chronic medications history end date

columns.name: CHRON_MED_HX_CMT
columns.description: Specifies the chronic medications history comments
